meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Latvia.
meanings.sent1: I exchanged my dollars for lati at the bank.
meanings.sent2: In Latvia, people use lati to buy things.
meanings.sent3: The lati in my wallet started dancing when I bought souvenirs.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a shiny lati, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sound of lati jingling in his pocket was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: A type of dance in Latin America.
meanings.sent1: The dancers moved gracefully to the rhythm of the lati.
meanings.sent2: Salsa is a popular lati that many people enjoy dancing.
meanings.sent3: The lati on the dance floor twirled and spun with joy.
meanings.sent4: Her feet glided across the floor like a skilled lati dancer.
meanings.sent5: The energy of the lati dance filled the room with excitement.

meanings.definition: A type of bean commonly used in Mexican cuisine.
meanings.sent1: I added some lati to my burrito for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: Black lati beans are a staple in Mexican cooking.
meanings.sent3: The lati beans in the pot were having a party with the spices.
meanings.sent4: The lati beans were like little nuggets of goodness in the dish.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of cooking lati beans filled the kitchen with a delicious scent.
